statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BankName , AA.AccountNo , AA.Depositor
FROM dbo.LMCustomerBank AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BankName , AA.AccountNo , AA.Depositor
FROM dbo.LMCustomerBank AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.LMCustomerBank ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerID, BankName, AccountNo, Depositor ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerID#, #BankName#, #AccountNo#, #Depositor# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.LMCustomerBank SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , BankName = #BankName# , AccountNo = #AccountNo# , Depositor = #Depositor# WHERE ID = #ID#
